context: BTC hovering around $97K after CPI data spooked markets. Fear & Greed at 9 (Extreme Fear) — historically a buying zone. Smart money accumulating while retail panics.

items.author: @CryptoDonAlt
items.content: Buy fear but scale slowly. Structure broken until $85K reclaimed.

items.author: @Pentosh1
items.content: Everyone bearish at the same time usually means we're close to a local bottom. Watch the weekly close.

items.author: r/cryptocurrency
items.content: Daily Discussion — Is this the bottom? Fear & Greed at historic lows

items.author: Coin Bureau
items.content: Why I'm NOT Selling My Bitcoin — Here's What Smart Money Is Doing

items.author: CoinDesk
items.content: Bitcoin drops 3.2% as macro fears mount, but institutional buying continues

items.author: @AltcoinSherpa
items.content: Alts getting destroyed. SOL and ETH both down 8%. Wait for BTC to stabilize before touching anything.

items.author: Belfort
items.content: Fear & Greed at single digits historically preceded 30-60 day rallies. DCA zone — not time to go all-in, but definitely not time to sell.

items.author: The Block
items.content: ETF inflows remain positive despite price decline — BlackRock added 2,400 BTC this week
